content:
Have you allowed the app to run in the background and/or excluded it from Android's battery optimization. This can often be the cause of sync issues. Where sync intervals below 15 minutes are desired, enabling the Push service is recommended on imap connections and delivers emails immediately.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/configure-push-email-thunderbird-android
creator: platform34

content:
Nothing in the latest beta's.

You can show your interest and vote for the feature on Mozilla Connect. https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/filtering-with-android-thunderbird/idi-p/61144
creator: platform34

content:
If your asking how to empty the spam folder...

  1. Select account
  2. Select spam folder
  3. Press the 3 dot menu
  4. Select empty spam

If your asking how to move an email into the spam folder...

  1. Select email
  2. Press 3 dot menu
  3. Select spam

Thunderbird for Android doesn't have any feature for spam or rule based filtering. Please clarify if your query is regarding Thunderbird desktop rather than the Android client.
creator: platform34
